claim: Jeff Bridges played Otis "Bad" Blake in the first half of Crazy Heart.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role as Otis `` Bad '' Blake in the 2009 film Crazy Heart , and earned Academy Award nominations for his roles in The Last Picture Show  (  1971  )  , Thunderbolt and Lightfoot  (  1974  )  , Starman  (  1984  )  , The Contender  (  2000  )  , True Grit  (  2010  )  , and Hell or High Water  (  2016  )  .
